Articles.Content: I would like to start a country on Kerbal and saw a post about land plots and stuff. I was wondering what this is ans where I can get it. I\'d like to start the I.R.I (International Republic of Idiots.... Lol). Thanks!

I believe you are talking about the roleplaying stuff. This would be better posted on the roleplaying forum. There are a couple of threads there explaining roleplay and its rules, and a couple plots of land are available for you to take if you wish. If you can\'t get a full blown country, I suggest getting a state or corporation owned by another country.
